name: 电竞俱乐部/ESports Club
description: ESports Club is a sim game based on electronic sports industry, including most popular game types such as FPS and MOBA. What are you still waiting for? Start your esports career now!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or Windows 7+ Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 2.0+ Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or Windows 7+ Processor: Intel I5+ Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better Storage: 500 MB available space
